'''Brian Williams''' is the best friend of [[Nick Marsh]].

==History==
Brian was at his daughter, Alex's, volleyball game when he had heart palpatations. He went to the hospital, where he was diagnosed with a pheochromocytoma on his adrenal gland. Because he'd previously donated a kidney to [[Nick Marsh]], he had only one adrenal gland, making his surgery extremely risky. Despite this complication, his surgery went well and he was stable afterward and his kidney was undamaged.

==Relationships==
===Romantic===
He is married to a woman named Paige.

===Familial===
He and his wife have three daughters. One daughter is trying to get a volleyball scholarship, one is in callbacks for the school play, and one just got dumped. In addition to that, he helped raise Nick's niece, Charlotte.

===Friendships===
He and [[Nick Marsh]] have been friends since they were five. They played Little League together and after Nick's mom died, he practically lived with Brian's family.
